evaluation.overall_comment: This translation suffers from severe issues primarily due to an uncontrolled and pervasive habit of adding explanatory text and comments that are not present in the original French. While individual technical terms are mostly handled correctly, the fundamental structure and natural flow of the conversation are completely undermined.
